SummaryÔÉÅ

We present tHMM, a Python3 library for exploring heterogeneity in lineage tree data. tHMM leverages the well-known principles of hidden Markov models and is adjusted to work with lineage tree data. tHMM performs clustering based on specific measurements of individuals and relations among them for improved specificity in pinpointing the structure and dynamics of heterogeneity focused on the measured phenotypes.
